evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Claims challenging the HUD CoC Conditions—namely, the HUD “Gender Ideology” Condition, HUD Discrimination Certification, HUD Abortion Condition, and HUD CoC E.O. Condition—are brought by the HUD CoC Plaintiffs against Defendants HUD and Turner.

extracted.value: Claims challenging the HUD CoC Conditions—namely, the HUD “Gender Ideology” Condition, HUD Discrimination Certification, HUD Abortion Condition, and HUD CoC E.O. Condition

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: D.  Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from including any of the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition in any NOFOs or awards, from requiring or permitting any funding recipient to impose any of the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition on subrecipients, and from otherwise imposing the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition on any funding recipient;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: E.  Award Plaintiffs reasonable costs and attorneys’ fees;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: F.  Grant any other relief that the Court deems fit and proper.

extracted.value: any other relief that the Court deems fit and proper
